description: This file defines an API client using axios for HTTP requests. It sets up a pre-configured axios instance with base URL, timeout, and interceptors to attach authentication tokens from Supabase on each request, and basic error handling on responses.

methods.name: axios.create
methods.description: Creates an axios instance with predefined configuration such as base URL and timeout.

methods.name: apiClient.interceptors.request.use
methods.description: Adds authorization header with access token from Supabase session to each request.

methods.name: apiClient.interceptors.response.use
methods.description: Handles response and errors; in case of 401, optional redirect to login or other security handling.
